description:
![alt text](https://sites.google.com/site/cakirbey/_/rsrc/1267560319771/ssgkr-medium-init-.jpg)

Game Key Revealer retrieves the CD-Key and Serial for installed games on computer. If you lost legal CD-Keys or Serials of your purchased games, you can find them with help of Game Key Revealer.

####Features:
- Recover game product keys
- CD Key Changer
   * Battlefield 2
   * Battlefield 2: Special Forces
   * Battlefield 2142
   * Command and Conquer 3: Tiberium Wars
   * Command and Conquer: Red Alert 3
   * Call of Duty 2
   * Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
   * Call of Duty: World at War
   * Counter-Strike
   * Counter-Strike 1.5-1.6
   * Crysis
   * Dead Space
   * Half-Life
   * Half-Life 2 (DVD Edition)
   * Medieval II: Total War
   * Mount and Blade: Warband
   * Mount and Blade: With Fire and Sword
   * Need for Speed Shift
   * Quake 4
   * Unreal Tournament 2004
- Refresh Rate Overriding
- and
author: Mustafa Buğra AKTAŞ
